meanings.sent1: She mispaints the walls with different colors.
meanings.sent2: He tends to mispaint the furniture when he rushes.
meanings.sent3: The artist accidentally mispaints a smiley face on the canvas.
meanings.sent4: The child mispaints the sky with purple clouds in his drawing.
meanings.sent5: Be careful not to mispaint the fence with the wrong shade of green.

meanings.definition: To apply paint in a sloppy or inaccurate manner.
meanings.sent1: They mispaint the house by leaving streaks on the walls.
meanings.sent2: The amateur painter tends to mispaint the edges of the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally mispaints its paws while walking on wet paint.
meanings.sent4: The storm seems to mispaint the landscape with dark shadows.
meanings.sent5: The children mispaint the sidewalk with colorful handprints.
